ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 29 Apr 1999 18:33:18 EDT, you wrote:


I just started smithing in Neriak.. I have found books and molds where
can you find stones and ore?

Thanks for the help,

Tendain
5th Level ShadowKnight (Test Server)
